statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName
, AA.ModuleName , AA.Assembly , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
FROM dbo.TModule AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.ModuleName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' OR AA.Assembly LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreateDate , AA.CreateBy , AA.CreateByName , AA.UpdateDate , AA.UpdateBy , AA.UpdateByName , AA.ModuleName , AA.Assembly , AA.UseYn , AA.Description FROM dbo.TModule AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TModule ( CreateDate, CreateBy, CreateByName, ModuleName, Assembly, UseYn, Description ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreateBy#, #CreateByName#, #ModuleName#, #Assembly#, #UseYn#, #Description# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TModule SET UpdateDate = GetDate() , UpdateBy = #UpdateBy# , UpdateByName= #UpdateByName#
, ModuleName = #ModuleName# , Assembly = #Assembly# , UseYn = #UseYn# , Description = #Description# WHERE ID = #ID#
